issue.title: [Release][GLib] Replace c_glib/ after running c_glib/autogen.sh in dev/release/02-source.sh
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5784](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5784). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
c_glib/ source archive is generated by `make dist` because includes configure script.
The current `dev/release/02-source.sh` build Arrow C++ and Arrow GLib to include the artifacts of GTK-Doc and then run `make dist`. But it is slow. 
So run only `c_glib/autogen.sh` and then replace c_glib/.
